DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Face Painting Stamps - Reindeer
DescriptionData.Description:
Stamp on face painting: With Ruby Red Face Paint stamps even the novice and youngest members of the party can get in on the face painting action. These are foam stamps, 1 inch thick and approximately 1.5 inches at their widest point.
Simply apply face paint directly to the stamp and then apply to skin, whether it's a cheek, forehead or hand--anywhere. These are for simple fast designs, for parties, or when you have a lot of faces to paint.
The Ruby Red foam stamps are easy to clean and reuse, so at the next event, party, picnic or festival when you're faced with a lot of hard-to-keep-still faces, just stamp 'em.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red Stamps are 1" thick for easy handling, even for children and are 1.5" at their widest point
Made from durable foam and are easy to clean
Perfect for the novice and for children to face paint each other
No artistic ability required; try them at parties and family events
